original_text: And if Christ did not rise, then you have believed a false message. God would still say that you are guilty, because of your sins.
korean_text: 그리스도께서 다시 살아나신 일이 없으면 너희의 믿음도 헛되고 너희가 여전히 죄 가운데 있을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And if Christ did not rise
then you have believed a false message
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 거짓된 메시지를 믿은 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God would still say that you are guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서는 여전히 너희가 죄가 있다고 말씀하실 것입니다
